name: Power Slime Shootout
description:
In this endless battle how long can you keep your slime alive?

Controls

ActionKeyboardMovementW/A/S/DJumpSpace Bar
InteractEThrow/Shoot
Left Mouse Button

Features 

  • Realistic Graphics (for the most part 😁)
  • Global Leaderboards, so that you can be the top slime in the power slime world
  • Partial controller support
